name: Origzo
description:
Origzo is a leading mobile application development company providing quality services on iOS, Android, Windows & Cross Platform. We have been successful in establishing healthy business relations with numerous international clients – from large enterprises to entrepreneurs to small sized businesses, turning into one of the most pioneering companies in Mobile and Web Development.
Subsequently, our services have extended substantially to several other domains like ecommerce and digital marketing.
Origzo has teamed up with some of the most intelligent minds in the industry, working for the love of developing new and exciting apps. They breathe, think, and live application development. It is their passion. Understanding client’s needs, working on their suggestions and incorporating their own technical expertise of various mobile platforms, APIs, frameworks, languages and more.
From our founding in 2011 to our launches of over 500 mobile and web application, We now have global presence with our offices located at US & India. We are also ISO 9001:2008 certified company as we follow best practices for mobile and web development.
Have requirement? Drop us an email at bizdev@origzo.com or give us a call at +1 (415) 871 0487 to receive a quote. If you have many projects to outsource, explore our partnership models.
